text: Food Hunters is an American cooking competition television series that aired on Nickelodeon Latin America. It premiered on Sunday, October 16, 2016 in Latin America, and concluded on January 15, 2017. The project began filming in May. This program features 12 episodes of 60 minutes and is produced in collaboration with Chef Lorena Garcia and Cinemat Inc. for Nickelodeon Latin America. == Format == Any children between ages eight (8) and thirteen (13) can apply to become a contestant on the series. In this dynamic show, four teams of two contestants each will compete in a fun obstacle race outside to collect the necessary ingredients for this great culinary contest Nickelodeon. The first three teams to complete the outdoor challenge will use the ingredients collected, their imagination and their culinary skills for individual testing against their peers in the kitchen. They will compete against the clock and under the command of the chef Venezuelan Lorena Garcia, who published author and owner of several restaurants, evaluate and decide who will be the winner of each episode. The winner wins a medal and a scholarship to continue his culinary studies. == List of episodes == {| class="wikitable" !No. in series !No. in season !Original Title !English Title !Original air date !Production Code |- |1 |1 |Como leche para mantequilla |Like milk for butter |October 16, 2016 |101 |- |2 |2 |El ingrediente misterioso |The mysterious ingredient |October 23, 2016 |102 |- |3 |3 |¡Viva la Pasta! |Long Live the Pasta! |October 30, 2016 |103 |- |4 |4 |¿La gallina o el huevo? |The hen or the egg? |November 6, 2016 |104 |- |5 |5 |Rica Ricota |Rich Ricota |November 13, 2016 |105 |- |6 |6 |Maíz Movedizo |Restless Maize |November 20, 2016 |106 |- |7 |7 |Papa y puntería |Potato and aim |November 27, 2016 |107 |- |8 |8 |Lluvia de mangos |Mango rain |December 4, 2016 |108 |- |9 |9 |Esqui granjero |Farmer skiing |December 11, 2016 |109 |- |10 |10 |Feliz como una lombriz |Happy like a worm |December 18, 2016 |110 |} == Contestants == === Episode 1 === {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; width:70%;" ! colspan="2" |Contestant !
